doc:
Melissa Joan Hart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melissa_Joan_Hart 0 Melissa Joan Hart (born April 18, 1976) is an American actress. She is best known for her starring roles as the titular characters in the sitcoms Clarissa Explains It All (1991–1994), Sabrina the Teenage Witch (1996–2003), and Melissa Joey (2010–2015). Hart has been married to musician Mark Wilkerson since July 19, 2003; together, they have three sons. Melissa_Joan_Hart ( born April_18_,_1976 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_starring_roles as the_titular_characters in the_sitcoms_Clarissa Explains It All_(_1991 – 1994_) , Sabrina the_Teenage_Witch_(_1996 – 2003_) , and Melissa_(_2010 – 2015_) . Hart has_been_married to musician_Mark_Wilkerson since July_19_,_2003 ; together , they have three_sons .
